articles.author: Luke Andrews
articles.title: Baby fox tests positive for BIRD FLU in Minnesota, officials reveal - Daily Mail
articles.description: It is believed to be the first confirmed case of bird flu in a fox in America, and the third in the world after two cases were also spotted in Ontario, Canada, last week.
articles.content:
A baby fox has tested positive for bird flu H5N1 in Minnesota, state officials revealed Wednesday, in the first case to be reported in a wild mammal in America.
The State's Department of Natural Res… [+8690 chars]

articles.title: Why the US has a baby formula shortage — and who is most at risk - Vox.com
articles.description: America is enduring its worst baby formula shortage in decades.
articles.content:
Baby formula has been running low all over the United States, threatening the health of infants and other people who depend on it for their sustenance.

articles.description: Share markets and the Australian dollar all fell today after American inflation came in higher than expected. Subscribe: http://ab.co/1svxLVE  Read more here...
